questions.question: A vanishing point is the essential element in a perspective drawing
In a perspective study, both the vanishing point and horizon line are always visible. (think about your current drawing)

choices.answer: a place for the viewer's eye to understand the point of view that they see

questions.question: A vanishing point makes it so that

choices.answer: shapes are understood in relation to space
some shapes appear very far away, while others appear closer to us
gives a sense of direction in space

questions.question: Forced perspective in photography is done differently than with a drawing.
When creating a forced perspective drawing you must

choices.answer: line up your buildings with a vanishing point
make sure you overlap some shapes to create a better 3-d feel
connect corners of buildings to the v.p. to create a sense of space.
